downloads.title: Downloads
downloads.description: Download Freesm Launcher for your platform for free, no ads, no viruses, no SMS, no registration, no calls, no glowies. Or don't do it, it's up to you!

about.title: About
about.description: Find out more about the Freesm Launcher development team and all the contributors here.

successful-login.title: Successful Login
successful-login.description: You have successfully logged in to Freesm Launcher using your Microsoft account!

successful-login.title: Successful Login
successful-login.description: You have successfully logged in to Freesm Launcher using your Microsoft account. You can close this window now. Have a good time!

footer.short-description: Another way to play Minecraft for free.

downloads.title: Downloads
downloads.description: Download Freesm Launcher for your specific platform.
downloads.getting-platform: Getting your platform... You can also manually select your platform just above!

about.title: About
about.description: We created Freesm Launcher to make it possible to play Minecraft with the conveniences that Prism Launcher provides, without requiring an online account.

hero.title: Download Freesm Launcher for
hero.description: Freesm Launcher is a custom launcher for Minecraft that allows you to play with offline account without any restrictions.

features.first-description: Freesm Launcher is an open source fork of Prism Launcher. All launcher code is available under the GPL-3.0 license.
features.second-description: Easily play Minecraft without any restrictions, even if you don't have an online account.
